terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.welcome_text: Welcome to our Wedding Planner app! Before proceeding, please read and accept our terms and conditions for matrimonial services:
terms.age_18: You must be at least 18 years old and legally eligible for marriage to use this service.
terms.age_accurate: You agree to provide accurate information about your age and marital status.
terms.profile_accurate: You agree to provide accurate and truthful information about yourself and your marriage preferences.
terms.no_impersonation: You will not impersonate others or create false identities for matrimonial purposes.
terms.no_explicit: You will maintain appropriate content suitable for a matrimonial platform.
terms.user_respect: You will treat other users and their families with respect and courtesy.
terms.no_harassment: You will not harass, stalk, or intimidate other users or their family members.
terms.no_sharing: You will not share other users' personal or family information without explicit consent.
terms.public_meeting: We strongly recommend initial meetings in public places with family knowledge.
terms.no_financial: Never share financial information or send money to other users before marriage.
terms.report: Report any suspicious behavior, fraud attempts, or inappropriate conduct immediately.
terms.data_collection: We collect and process your matrimonial data as described in our Privacy Policy.
terms.profile_visible: Your profile information will be visible to potential matches and their families.
terms.privacy_control: You control your privacy settings and can hide/show specific information.
terms.data_sharing: Your data may be shared with verified wedding vendors and matrimonial consultants to enhance your experience.
terms.vendor_partnerships: We partner with wedding venues, photographers, and other wedding service providers who may contact you with relevant offers.
terms.account_responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining your account security and protecting your personal information.
terms.report_unauthorized: Report any unauthorized access or suspicious activity immediately.
terms.no_credential_sharing: Do not share your login credentials with others except trusted family members.
terms.matchmaking: Our app provides matchmaking services but does not guarantee successful marriages.
terms.family_involvement: We encourage family involvement in the matrimonial process as per cultural traditions.
terms.background_verification: While we strive to verify profiles, you are responsible for conducting your own background checks.
terms.vendor_network: We may connect you with our network of wedding vendors and service providers.
terms.third_party_services: Wedding vendor services are provided by third parties and subject to their own terms.
terms.no_liability: We are not liable for services provided by third-party wedding vendors.
terms.termination_right: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent behavior.
terms.delete_account: You can delete your account at any time, but some data may be retained for legal purposes.
terms.successful_match: Please inform us of successful matches to help improve our services.
terms.periodic_updates: We may update these terms periodically to reflect changes in matrimonial laws or services.
terms.continued_acceptance: Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
terms.agreement_text: By accepting these terms, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all terms and conditions for matrimonial and wedding planning services. You understand that your data may be shared with wedding vendors and that this is a platform for serious matrimonial purposes.
terms.welcome_message: Welcome to your journey of love! üíï
terms.welcome_subtitle: Please review our terms and conditions for matrimonial and wedding planning services.
terms.section_1_item_1: Must be 18+ years old and legally eligible for marriage
terms.section_1_item_2: Provide accurate age and marital status information
terms.section_2_item_1: Provide truthful information about yourself and preferences
terms.section_2_item_2: No impersonation or false identities allowed
terms.section_2_item_3: Maintain appropriate content for matrimonial purposes
terms.section_3_item_1: We collect matrimonial data as per our Privacy Policy
terms.section_3_item_2: Profile visible to potential matches and families
terms.section_3_item_3: Data shared with verified wedding vendors for better experience
terms.section_3_item_4: Partner with wedding venues, photographers, and service providers
terms.section_4_item_1: Connect with our network of wedding vendors
terms.section_4_item_2: Third-party services subject to their own terms
terms.section_4_item_3: Not liable for third-party vendor services
terms.section_5_item_1: Meet initially in public places with family knowledge
terms.section_5_item_2: Never share financial information before marriage
terms.agreement_message: By accepting, you agree to use our platform responsibly for serious matrimonial purposes and understand your data may be shared with wedding service providers.

aisha.text: This app helped me find someone who truly shares my Islamic values. The guardian feature was especially helpful for my family.

muhammad.text: I appreciated how the app let me filter by prayer habits and other important religious practices. I found my husband here!
muhammad.name: Muhammad Qasim

fatima.text: The values-based matching helped me connect with sisters who share my commitment to the deen. Alhamdulillah!
fatima.name: Fatima Hassan
